title: FullStack Developer - Felipe Sanchez
description: FullStack Developer from Ibague, Colombia. Developer in JavaScript ES6+, Node.js, React, Astro, and ReactNative-Expo.

hero.title: Hello, I am Felipe Sanchez!
hero.description: Developer in web and cross-platform applications using technologies such as Astro, React, React Native-Expo, JavaScript, and Node.js.

jobs_description.title: FullStack Web Developer
jobs_description.description: I create modern websites by applying best practices in UI/UX to enhance user experience. I redesign, optimize SEO, improve security, and accelerate page performance, organizing key information to increase conversion rates and visits.

jobs_description.title: Cross-Platform App Developer in ReactNative-Expo
jobs_description.description: I develop cross-platform applications using React Native for clients in various industries. I implement scalable solutions, optimize app performance, and integrate APIs in both Frontend and Backend services. I also apply best practices in user experience (UI/UX) and conduct thorough testing to ensure proper functionality across different devices and platforms.

projects.title: Web Foundation San Dimas
projects.description: San Dimas Foundation, dedicated to the protection of biodiversity and natural ecosystems in Colombia.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who am I beyond the screen?
about.description: Programming is one of my greatest passions, but not everything in my life revolves around it. I am a persistent and creative person, always looking to balance my interests. I love football, playing chess, watching movies, and exploring the world by visiting new places. My main focus has been on studying technologies and improving my programming logic until I felt comfortable enough to share what I know, in my own way. Unlike traditional classes or courses that focus on formal theories, my goal is to teach programming in a more natural way, without the need to read manuals or use technical language that might be complicated.

contact.title: Ready to bring your ideas to life?
contact.subtitle: I can boost your project or be part of your team
